title: Bak Industries 48506 BAKFlip MX4 Hard Folding Truck Bed Cover
features: BAK Industries 48506 BAKFlip MX4 Hard Folding Truck Bed Cover; Matte Finish; [Available While Supplies Last];
description: Durable Aluminum Matte Finish Panels. Drive With Cover In Closed/Folded Or Flipped Up Position. Universal Tailgate Operation With Dual Action Seal. 100% Truck Bed Access. Advanced Scratch/Scuff And UV Resistance. Rated Up To 400 lbs. Of Evenly Distributed Weight. Injection Molded Latch Housing For Long-Term Durability. Premium Density Foam Core. Locks With Tailgate. EPDM Outer Rail Seals For Maximum Water Resistance. Automatic Latching Panels. Extended 3-Year Warranty.
